name: Heroku PyTelegramBotAPI Webhook
description: Run PyTelegramBotAPI with Webhook on Heroku with ease.

TELEGRAM_TOKEN.description: Copy Telegram bot gathered from BotFather.

scripts.postdeploy:
heroku run "HEROKU_API_KEY=`heroku authorizations:create --expires-in 600 --short` heroku pgbackups:capture SILVER -a ${HEROKU_APP_NAME}" -a ${HEROKU_APP_NAME}
 && heroku config:set HEROKU_URL=$(heroku info -s | grep web_url | cut -d= -f2) --app ${HEROKU_APP_NAME}
